summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center Legal Department providing the password for a disc containing discovery materials in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being provided.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The author of the letter, signing on behalf of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center Legal Department, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It provides the password ('USAOsdnyl!') for a disc containing discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and discovery sharing in the Maxwell case as of December 2020.
The correspondence is addressed to the legal department of the Metropolitan Detention Center, where Maxwell was likely held.
